We have a new security protocol that requires every user to undergo a verification process. The process involves scanning their device's unique ID and comparing it with our database. In case of any discrepancy, we will immediately block the device from accessing the platform until the issue is resolved. Please follow these steps:

2. Launch the app and scan your device's unique ID by clicking on "Scan Device" button.
3. The app will generate a verification code. Please note this code down or take a screenshot for future reference.
4. Log in to your account on our website, go to the settings page, and enter the verification code under "Device Verification" section.
5. Once the code is accepted, your device will be considered safe and allowed access to the platform.

This process must be completed by all users within the next 24 hours. Failure to do so may result in account suspension until the verification is completed. If you face any issues during this process, please contact our support team immediately at: support@example.com.

Note: Please make sure that your internet connection is stable while performing these steps. In case of an error, the app will automatically retry the operation without delay, ensuring maximum efficiency and security.
